menu.item-veg-description: 2 steamed rice pancakes served with mix vegetable stew cooked in mildy spicy & flavourful creamy coconut milk based gravy
menu.item-nonveg-name: Appam with Kerala Style Egg Curry
menu.item-nonveg-description: 2 steamed rice panakes served with mildy spicy egg curry cooked in coconut milk based gravy. A traditional teamup from the state of Kerala

menu.item-veg-description: Mushrrom and green peas cooked in onion tomato based curry with homemade spices served with 2 parathas + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A spicy lip smacking chicken curry slow cooked in aromatic Indian spices along with potatoes served with rice and papad

menu.item-veg-description: Aromatic Basmati rice cooked with beetroot in coconut milk and a hearty garnish of nuts, rasins and whole spices served with papad and yogurt dip
menu.item-nonveg-description: Spicy succulent shrimp in a coconut based sauce with spicy and tangy gravy served with aromatic Basmati rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese and green peas cooked with whole spices in onion-tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken cooked in classic flavours of Tamil Nadu made of a fresh blend of aromatic Chettinad spices in thick gravy served with rice + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Spicy, flavourful mix sprout curry cooked in homemade fresh spice mix. A famous Maharashtrian street food served with 2 buns + classic Bombay mixture (fried snack mix)
menu.item-nonveg-description: Bengali fish curry with light spicy curry cooked in mustard and flavourful spices served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A comfort meal from the state of Kerala. Black gram cooked in a flavourful curry served with steamed riceflour cakes.
menu.item-nonveg-description: Succulent braised lamb meat in a yogurt sauce with ground spices. A perfect comfort meal for cold a winter day served with 2 parathas + rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A dish from the state of Maharashtra, small aurbergine stuffed with spicy, flavourful homemade spice mix and cooked with some onions. Served with 2 chapatis  + side salad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A hot and spicy flavourful chicken dish from the region of Kolapur. Chicken cooked in special Kolapuri spice blend and served with 2 chapatis + rice + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A mildly sweet, flavourful Indian cottage cheese cooked in creamy rich gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Warm comforting shrimp curry cooked in coconut & tamarind based rich creamy gravy. Served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: One of the most popular  street foods from Delhi. Made with dried green peas with aromatic spices and served with kulchas (flatbread) + green spicy chutney + Pickled onions
menu.item-nonveg-description: Sour, tangy Mackerel curry made in mildy flavourful fresh ground blend of spices served with rice + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Baby potatoes fried and cooked in aromatic ,flavourful spicy yogurt based gravy served with rice + achar + side salad + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken marinated over night in yogurt and spice mix and cooked on a low flame in layer of aromatic flavourful basmati rice, fried onion, fresh mind and coriander served with yogurt dip+ pickle+ papad

menu.item-veg-description: Spicy, hot and one of the most loved dish in India. Flavourful Indo- Chinese noodles with mix of veggies and lots of garlic and heat.
menu.item-nonveg-description: Spicy, hot and full of amazing flavours, one of the most loved Indo- chinese dishes of Mumbai. Chicken and a mx of veggies cooked with garlic and chillies. a dish definately to try for.

menu.item-veg-description: jackfruit cooked in roasted aromatic homeblend spice mix served with 2 paratha + rice + side salad + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Slow cooked lamb meat cooked in spicy fresh blend of spices in a aromatic minced meet based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + acahar + papad
